ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] GZ answers some bard questions
ygData.msgSnippet: ok true, but i didn t mean you can t do it.  i meant why in the world would you want to =)  in other words, if you go to kedge neither the bard nor anyone else
ygData.messageBody:
ok true, but i didn't mean you can't do it. i meant why in the world would
you want to =) in other words, if you go to kedge neither the bard nor
anyone else there is going to be using the acquatic ayre as a primary means
of breathing. it's gonna be EB, or a fishbone/singing gaunts with the song
memmed as a backup in case the EB'er dies, or for getting ressed, etc.

Shada

> I disagree with this. Although I get an enduring breath
> whenever doing
> underwater fighting if this song effect drops you still have
> your whole
> breath bar to go through before you start drowning so even
> accounting for a
> normal number of mixed notes you could do your 3 song
> rotation and mix this
> one in as the third song every second time and you'd be fine.
> It worked
> once for me on a corpse recovery, but I do get enduring
> breath because its a
> little too high stress for me. :)
